mapper.update:

accountId = #{accountId},
bonusesVipId = #{bonusesVipId},
createTime = #{createTime},
giveTime = #{giveTime},
status = #{status},
WHERE id = #{id}

accountId = #{update.accountId},

${nativeSql}
